H0.text: The name of which martial art comes from Korean words meaning 'kick fist method'. Kuk Sool

H1.text: The name of which martial art comes from Korean words meaning 'kick fist method'. Hapkido

H2.text: The name of which martial art comes from Korean words meaning 'kick fist method'. Kumdo

H3.text: The name of which martial art comes from Korean words meaning 'kick fist method'. 태권도

A4.text: Taekwondo can be translated as tae ('strike with foot'), kwon ('strike with hand'), and do ('the art or way').
